delete-confirmation.action-text: I understand the consequence, delete my account
delete-confirmation.subtitle: Deleting your Quran.com account is permanent and cannot be undone. Your account data, preferences, and history will be permanently removed from your profile and will no longer be available. If you use the same login for QuranReflect, that account will also be deleted. [Please note: This does not affect your donor account and is not tied to your donations. Donations must be managed directly through the donor platform.]
delete-confirmation.title: Are you absolutely sure?

delete-profile-picture.subtitle: You will delete the profile pic and reset it to the default, Are you sure?
delete-profile-picture.title: Delete Profile Picture

errors.remove-failed: Failed to remove profile picture. Please try again.
errors.upload-failed: Failed to upload profile picture. Please try again.

abandoned-quran-goal.description: An email will be sent to remind you of your Quran goal if you have not made progress in a while.
abandoned-quran-goal.title: Goal Reminder

quran-reading-program.description: An email will be sent with links to the weekly reading assignment, reflection prompts, and more resources to keep you on track.
quran-reading-program.title: Quran in a Year

streaks-that-will-break.description: An email will be sent to notify you of a streak that is about to break.
streaks-that-will-break.title: Streaks
